snippet: Europe may be enduring its worst crisis in decades, but it should not overlook its contribution to peace and democracy, according to the Nobel Peace Prize committee. Awarding its 2012 prize to the European Union, it warned against a rise in extremism...
abstract: Europe may be enduring its worst crisis in decades, but it should not overlook its contribution to peace and democracy, according to the Nobel Peace Prize committee. Awarding its 2012 prize to the European Union, it warned against a rise in extremism on the Continent that could set the clock back.

headline.main: Europe Told to Count Its Blessings
